name: Dozer Blocks
description:
~A game made in 48 hrs for the first GMTK Jam ~

Spacebar to change directions and aim the grabby thing.
X button to grab/shoot. 
Only 4 levels. 4th level will loop back to level 1.
Enjoy!

Made this for Game Maker's TookKit's Game Jam based on their Dual Purpose game design video on Down Well. I was thinking to have the character move and have them aim using the same button for a dual purpose design to build from.

Spacebar to change directions and aim the grabby thing. 
X button to grab/shoot. 

Resources used:
Unity with C# Photoshop to make the sprites

Contributors:
 David Ramirez
